mapper.select: select t.title_name as title, k.chapter as chapter, k.verse as verse, k.content as contents, s.sChapter, s.eChapter from BIBLE_KORHRV k, BIBLE_SCHEDULE s, BIBLE_TITLE t where k.book = t.title_num and k.book = s.book and k.chapter >= s.sChapter and s.eChapter >= k.chapter and s.day in (#{day});
select s.day AS day, t.title_name AS title, s.sChapter AS sChapter, s.eChapter AS eChapter, s.hits AS hits from BIBLE_SCHEDULE s, BIBLE_TITLE t where s.book = t.title_num and s.day in (#{day});
